hero.title: Hey There, I'm Tonkla Fullstack Developer
hero.subtitle: I build beautifully simple fullstack applications, and I love what I do.
contact.subtitle: Feel free to reach me via email, phone, or social links below.
about.summary: A sociable and enthusiastic learner who enjoys challenges and continuous growth. Skilled in backend development using Django and PostgreSQL, and frontend implementation with Next.js. Passionate about building efficient, user‑focused systems and collaborating in team environments to deliver high‑quality results.
contact.openToWork.text: Interested in Fullstack roles and eager to learn new technologies.
exp.0.title: Senior Project: The system for testing the temperature and electric current standards of an iron.
exp.0.bullets.0: Designed and implemented a temperature monitoring system for electric irons using a microcontroller to accurately measure and control heat levels.
exp.0.bullets.1: Developed a custom gateway application with Electron.js, enabling communication between the computer and the microcontroller via Serial protocol for command transmission and data collection.
exp.0.bullets.2: Stored temperature data in a PostgreSQL database, ensuring reliable and structured data management.
exp.0.bullets.3: Created a dashboard using Next.js, visualizing temperature trends and device status for effective monitoring and control.
exp.1.title: Backend Developer Intern, XTEN Technology
exp.1.bullets.0: Contributed to developing and maintaining backend systems using Django and PostgreSQL, implementing APIs and database structures for internal and client projects.
exp.1.bullets.1: Supported data migration, monitoring, and cleaning processes to improve system accuracy and performance.
exp.1.bullets.2: Learned and practiced SQL optimization, API design, and Agile workflow, while assisting in testing and debugging backend features.
proj.0.title: License Plate Recognition Parking Barrier System

proj.1.title: Webhotel Project
proj.1.description: Designed RESTful APIs and performed web scraping.
